basic.description:
An examination of key issues in Canadian Politics. Topics will vary from year to year; consult the departmental website for further details.
LEARNING HOURS (LECTURE)    120 (36L;84P)
LEARNING HOURS (SEMINAR)    120 (36S;12G;72P)
basic.subject: POLS
basic.title: Canadian Politics: Questions & Challenges

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite  Level 4 and (registration in a POLS major or medial plan) and POLS250 and (a GPA of 2.5 on all units in POLS).
